definition: to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)

sentences.english: He was very angry at the remarks made by his teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他对老师的批语很生气。

sentences.english: Critics argue this stunt is hostile to the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 批语家指出这样的惊人表演是对天主教堂的不敬重。

sentences.english: The first thing to remember is not to criticize anyone.
sentences.chinese: 记得第一要务就是不要批语别人。

sentences.english: His father scolded him for being too free with the teachers.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲批语他对老师太随便。

definition: headnotes/comments or footnotes at top of the page
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
to write the title of a book on a label
annotations made in a book/fig. remarks and comments/to have an opinion on everything
Concise History of the Chinese Novel by Lu Xun 鲁迅
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao3 shuo1 Shi3 lu:e4
